casebody.data:
Eddy PLACIDE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2016

Vishal K. Garg, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

*1151Margaret Gaffney Radionovas, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Eddy Placide's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 497, 143 A.3d 1174 (2016), is denied.
